text: very very simple but what I'm doing is I'm monetizing the movements that we're seeing because if you don't do this from a trading perspective you kind of just hold through these movements and your pl will change but it's unrealized you're not able to start building a larger position and compounding the position that's really the the whole point here but this break is no good in my opinion it is now in this really big volume node it's the second largest volume node that's on here but to me the level to be beat is here now because once if it falls below this there's nothing there's very very very little support all the way down until it gets down towards here so I don't necessarily foresee that happening just yet I I never know I also didn't foresee this move today happening so just cuz I don't see it coming doesn't mean it won't happen but I do think that there's a pretty good chance that it'll consolidate in here for a while just because there's a lot of people that are willing to willing to transact at these levels so it will be a really really big big open tomorrow to see where this thing sits after hours it ticked up about 10 10 cents so not a big up move at all but it's better than seeing it continuing down in the after hours so that that might show a little bit of strength tomorrow
